vulnerability_findings.name: non-payable-constructor
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider making costructor payable to save gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: state-variable-read-in-a-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: Replace state variable reads and writes within loops with local variable reads and writes.

vulnerability_findings.name: unnecessary-checked-arithmetic-in-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: A lot of times there is no risk that the loop counter can overflow. Using Solidity's unchecked block saves the overflow checks.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-prefix-increment-not-postfix
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using the prefix increment expression whenever the return value is not needed. The prefix increment expression is cheaper in terms of gas.

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in MockFlagsInterface.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (MockFlagsInterface.sol#3): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '' of FlagsInterface.getFlag (MockFlagsInterface.sol#6) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function getFlags(address[] calldata) external view returns (bool[] memory);
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '' of FlagsInterface.getFlags (MockFlagsInterface.sol#8) is not in mixedCase

errors: exception (RuntimeError: Source map error, unknown name(SHR) or instr_name(INVALID))
